bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition identical with wu lao 五勞 , five types of exhaustion. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry huang qin 黃芩 quoting Qian jin bei ji fang 千金備急方 : 巴郡太守奏三黃丸治男子五勞七傷 , 消渴 , “The tai shou official from the prefecture Ba submitted the ‘pills with three [ingredients with the character] huang [in their names]’ to cure the five types of exhaustion and seven types of harm of males, and melting with thirst”, writes: 巴郡太守奏加減 三黃丸：療男子五癆七傷，消渴 , “The tai shou official from the prefecture Ba submitted the ‘pills with three [ingredients with the character] huang [in their names] that are to be amended or diminished [in accordance with individual requirements]’ to cure the five types of exhaustion-illness and seven types of harm of males, and melting with thirst, Wu lei 痦㿔 , clustered [seeds]-illness [4]

Pathological Condition identical with pei lei 㾦㿔 . Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry ban mao 斑蝥 quoting Sheng ji zong lu 聖濟總錄 : 面 上如有㾦㿔未消者，用乾斑貓末，以生油調成膏，傅患上 , “When cluster-illness seeds appear on the face and fail to dissolve, use dry ban mao powder, mix with fresh oil to prepare a paste and apply this externally to the affected area”, writes: 面上痦㿔：大風，面上有紫痦㿔未消。用乾斑蝥末，以生油 調傅 , “ Clustered [seeds]-illness on the face: when in the case of massive wind, on the face appear crimson-colored clustered seeds that fail to dissolve, use dry ban mao powder, mix with fresh oil to prepare a paste and apply this externally”.
